body.en:
Go to User->Profile->Preferences

Turn on/off the setting Enable Interactive Pricing

title.en: How to enable/disable Configurator in page mode?

body.en:
Go to User->Profile->Preferences

Turn on/off the setting Configurator Pagination Mode

title.en: How to control notification mail preferences?

body.en:
Go to User->Profile->Preferences

There are four settings to control notification mail preferences. Turning of Recieve Email will switch off all notification emails.

title.en: How can user select default report templates

body.en:
Go to User->Profile->Preferences

Select default report templates in the report remplate section.
